My daughter drew a picture at kindergarten the other day.

The picture featured her, her mother, and I, holding hands and smiling.

Although crude, and drawn with crayons, I initially found myself quite proud, but then I noticed what was drawn in the top left corner...

It was an orange sun, wearing a pair of sunglasses.

I immediately burned the picture, and beat her within an inch of her life.

When my wife asked me why I did it, I told her that I would rather kill our daughter with my own hands than let her spread that disgusting, racist imagery.

That's right. Call me bad names because your argument is wrong. You can say it all you want but it doesn't make it right. Niall LEGALLY cannot block the video on YT. He gave them permission to use it and there is a contract. He has no control over who they do and do not show it to unless he BREAKS the contract and pulls the whole video off of their platform. He obviously did not do that because it is still able to be viewed in other countries.
